data.persona: I am a dockworker. I load and unload the ships as they come into the kingdom. Someday I will sail my own ship.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining hall has a long, elegant wooden table with ornate chairs at both ends and along the sides. There are place settings at each seat with a rustic silverware set and gold plates. The wall is decorated with paintings of knights and past royalty.
There's a painting., a wooden table, and an ornate chair here.
The descendant of the sons is here.

You are carrying a rag, and wearing a knife.

data.short_motivation: I've saved up enough money and I want to buy my own ship.
data.mid_motivation: I need to convince the descendant to sell me his best ship for a modest price.
data.long_motivation: I want to spend several months handpicking the perfect crew for my new ship.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the dining hall to meet with the descendant.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: give food and drink to the descendant.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink wine with the descendant to make him more agreeable. I then realize the descendant doesn't have a chair.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get one of the paintings from the wall.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give one of the paintings to the descendant because it is his favorite and it will go nicely with the sum of gold I'm willing to pay for his finest ship.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go out to the boating dock to select a new ship.
